## Checklist
> **All must be checked before submission**

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] **Only one tool** is added/changed in this PR
- [ ] All required fields are **complete and accurate**
- [ ] Tool URL is **valid and publicly accessible**
- [ ] Tool is **not already in the list**
- [ ] Tool is in the **correct category**
- [ ] Tool is added at the **end of its category**
- [ ] No unrelated changes (formatting, whitespace, etc.)
